Sadly this once good to play game is now is plagued by season pass idiots who don't actually play the game and instead do dumb shit like, "let CT pick up the hostage so the terrorists can kill the CT and gain the mission objective of the pass". People don't actually play the game.

I saw this on 23 different servers across 3 days. Horrible community.

Valve continues to let hackers run rampant. I'm not talking about the questionable wallers, or the players that or sorta sus, Im talking about the spin botters that I regularly run across at LEM in wingman, and Silver 4 in competitive. This is also in Prime matchmaking, and the players even have good skins. This is fucknig retarded, and it makes it so hard to play this game and take the game seriously, when you lose every 4 game to a spinbotter with a scout. Fuck you valve. Fuck you Gabe Newell.
its a fun game if you have the money for prime
this game is addicting and will ruin your life. 10/10
